title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate, 12/11/09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 11, 2009

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate, 12/11/09




Marilyn A. Brown, of Georgia, to be a Member of the Board of Directors of the Tennessee Valley Authority for a term expiring May 18, 2012, vice Susan Richardson Williams, term expired.
Sharon E. Burke, of Maryland, to be Director of Operational Energy Plans and Programs. (New Position)
William Charles Ostendorff, of Virginia, to be a Member of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission for the remainder of the term expiring June 30, 2011, vice Dale Klein, resigned.
